roleset.name: say
roleset.note: DISCLOSE-V NOTES: comparison to 'say'. Member of VNcls say-37.7, indicate-78-1-1. (from disclose.01-v)
DISCLOSURE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry disclose.01, maps to VNcls say-37.7, indicate-78-1-1. (from disclosure.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Documents filed with the SEC on the pending spinoff disclosed that Cray Research Inc. will withdraw the almost $100 million in financing it is providing the new firm if Mr. Cray leaves.
example.arg: Documents filed with the SEC on the pending spinoff
that Cray Research Inc. will withdraw the almost $100 million in financing it is providing the new firm if Mr. Cray leaves.

example.name: split, sorta
example.text: Billings-2 weren't disclosed *trace-2* for the small account.

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: Sen. Glenn said he had already made a complete disclosure of his role in the affair and `` I am completely satisfied to let this matter rest in the hands of the Senate Ethics Committee . ''
example.arg: of his role in the affair

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Auditor position in reprisal for his disclosure of wrongdoing to the Inspector General of the Department of the Navy.
example.arg: to the Inspector General of the Department of the Navy.
